body: Repulsion, resentment, crushing self loathing, suicidal, breaking down.. I've been there and mostly recovered, yet got shaken by this,, panic, hyperventilation, tension in the limbs, hard pressing headache, and the long moment lamenting "how did things come to this"..   Family are either too precious and fragile I'm never involving them, or just of a nature that doesn't make them an option, friends either had their miseries, or just disappointed.. Yet I'm alive, I'll live

@delta32 may you go on and live, feel the heat in your beating heart and feel alive. Things will take their course, what ever it is, though keep a little hope for that they could always get better. Throughout life family ties is what stand the sands of time, treasure them, and as long as people try to make up for thing, to be better to others, they will influence it, then the family will brighten.  Live on friend, and take care of your self
I love these type of GL stories. It makes my heart shudder so much and I love it so much.

tfw this doujin is like explaining all the story about these double mint in the game (bandori). so you don't have to read the event story about them and just read this doujin if you want to understand about these double mint. lel
This was very sad! I hope we get part 2 soon!

i came here to fap and ended up getting an emotional breakdown.
since my (not blood related) sister got interested in me and we went too far with our relationship, i became insanely obsessed with her and almost ended up destroying our relationship of brother and sister.
also, my mother used to constantly beat the shit out of me. once she hit me with a decorarive stone we had so many times, she broke my left hand.
after she came back from the tratment, she was another person. a loving and carrying mother that just wanted peace.
i couldn't stand her this way.
everytime she came to scold me, the end were only with me and her on the floor. both exhausted. she couldn't beat me anymore and i couldn't be beaten of how much tired we were.
i didn't understand our relationship after that and i am the one who ended up being very violent until some months ago.
this is a throwback to these two times in my life.
i couldn't stand a gentle and carrying mother and almost lost the love of my sister.

This shit came out of nowhere with translation already. Boppin' lol! 

Damn, love Sayo being so submissive as usual. I'm gonna wait for the next doujin of this artist!
need more sad yuri but whats with the boppin lmao
Dark, but in a way that drew me in.
